original_text:
This is the account of Noah and his family.
Noah was a righteous man, blameless among the people of his time, and he walked faithfully with God.
korean_text: 이것이 노아의 족보니라 노아는 의인이요 당대에 완전한 자라 그는 하나님과 동행하였으며

sentences.original_text: This is the account of Noah
blameless among the people of his time
sentences.korean_translation: 그 시대 사람들 중 흠 없는 자였습니다

sentences.original_text: and he walked faithfully with God
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그는 하나님과 함께 신실하게 동행했습니다
